title: The Villainess is a Marionette - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Calm Protagonist   Childcare   Clever Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Early Romance   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   God Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Yandere   Obsessive Love   Overpowered Protagonist   Overprotective Siblings   Politics   Reincarnation   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Sibling Rivalry   Siblings   Sister Complex   Smart Couple   Tragic Past   Villainess Noble Girls   Weak to Strong
author: Han Yi Rim   한이림
description:
Kayena, the Imperial Princess, was known as the most beautiful woman in the Empire. She was a woman who knew nothing but evil and luxury.

However, she was destined for ruin: she would be used as a chess piece by her younger brother to secure his throne and killed by her crazy husband.

“I’ll make you the Emperor.”

“… Sister, are you referring to me?”

“In exchange, give me freedom.”

She had to change things before she became that Kayena.>
